author: Spiegel
title: Ground News - Biden: “No family should go through such ordeal”
text:
Summary by Spiegel The 70-year-old was considered the oldest hostage still held in the Gaza Strip. It is now clear that she and her husband died during the raid on October 7. US President Biden expressed his shock. Share menu More
